instructions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.
In a large bowl, toss the chopped carrots, sweet potatoes, and halved brussels sprouts with 2 tablespoons of olive oil.
Season with 1 teaspoon of salt and 1/4 teaspoon of pepper.
Spread the vegetables out in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
